text.div:
Profound Impairment, Both Eyes

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    13734003 Impairment level: better eye: profound impairment: lesser eye: total impairment (disorder)
    193699007 Blindness - both eyes (disorder)
    193703005 Better eye: near total visual impairment, Lesser eye: total visual impairment (disorder)
    193704004 Better eye: near total visual impairment, Lesser eye: near total visual impairment (disorder)
    193707006 Better eye: profound visual impairment, Lesser eye: near total visual impairment (disorder)
    193708001 Better eye: profound visual impairment, Lesser eye: profound visual impairment (disorder)
    232150003 Partial sight - both eyes (disorder)
    36676002 Impairment level: profound impairment of both eyes (disorder)
    38465001 Impairment level: near-total impairment of both eyes (disorder)
    7469001 Impairment level: better eye: near-total impairment: lesser eye: total impairment (disorder)
    7758003 Impairment level: better eye: profound impairment: lesser eye: near-total impairment (disorder)
    88768004 Impairment level: total impairment of both eyes (disorder)
